game.name: quarantine ME
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 색상 대체, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A projective test disguised as a videogame.Confine yourself for 10 days, explore 12 different paths, make imperfect choices, and face over 100 endings.quarantine ME is not for those seeking entertainment — it’s for those willing to confront themselves.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A projective test disguised as a videogame.Confine yourself for 10 days, explore 12 different paths, make imperfect choices, and face over 100 endings.quarantine ME is not for those seeking entertainment — it’s for those willing to confront themselves.
